Package Classes

Class BTreeNode

java.lang.Object
Classes.BTreeNode
Direct Known Subclasses:
BTreeInnerNode, BTreeLeafNode
abstract class BTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object
BTreeNode abstract class for every type of node in a B+Tree

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description

  • Constructor Details

    • BTreeNode

      protected BTreeNode​(int page_size, int page, FileHandler fileHandler)
      Constructor for the BTreeNode.
      Parameters:
      fileHandler - FileHandler instance that accesses the file.
      page_size - Size in bytes of every innerNode.
      page - Page number of the node.

      Returns:

      Method for sibling transfer.

      sibling - The sibling node.

      Returns:
      The processed node.

      Method for sibling fusion.
      Parameters:
      sinkKey - The sinkKey value.
      rightSibling - The rightSibling node.

    • pushUpKey

      protected abstract BTreeNode pushUpKey​(int key, int leftChild, int rightNode)
      Method for pushing a key to upper nodes.
      Parameters:
      key - The key we want to push up.
      leftChild - The page index of the leftChild.
      rightNode - The page index of the rightChild.
      Returns:
      The processed node.

    • split

      protected abstract BTreeNode split()
      Method for splitting a node if we have overflow.
      Returns:
      The new node.

    • search

      public abstract int search​(int key)
      Method for searching for a key in the node.
      Parameters:
      key - The key we are searching for.
      Returns:
      The index of the key in the node if it exists.

    • getNodeType

      public abstract int getNodeType()
      Getter for getting the node type of the leafNode node.
      Returns:
      Returning 1 as it is an leaf node.

    • canLendAKey

      public boolean canLendAKey()
      Method for checking if the node can lend a key.
      Returns:
      Returning true if the node can and false if it can't.

    • retrieveNode

      protected BTreeNode retrieveNode​(int page)
      Method for retrieving a node from the index file.
      Parameters:
      page - The page of the target node.
      Returns:
      Returning the BtreeNode instance we retrieved.

    • saveNode

      protected void saveNode​(BTreeNode node)
      Method for saving a node to the hashTable.
      Parameters:
      node - The node we want to save.

    • isOverflow

      public boolean isOverflow()
      Method that checks if the node has overflow.
      Returns:
      Returning true if the node is indeed overflowed.

    • dealOverflow

      public BTreeNode dealOverflow()
      Method for dealing with the overflow in node.
      Returns:
      Returning the return argument of pushUpKey.

    • isUnderflow

      public boolean isUnderflow()
      Method that checks if the node has underflow.
      Returns:
      Returning true if the node is indeed underflow.

    • dealUnderflow

      public BTreeNode dealUnderflow()
      Method for dealing with the overflow in node.
      Returns:
      Returning the corresponding value of each case.
